summary: A female character preset I made for RaceMenu, that comes with a vampire and a normal look.
descriptionHtml:
[left]Hi Everyone! This will be the first file I'll be uploading here in the Nexus, which is a [color=#ffff00]Racemenu[/color] Preset. She uses the UNPB body type, before I forget.

[size=4]Installation[/size]
[list=1]
[*][size=2]Extract the files to your a temporary folder ( or wherever you want to place it ).[/size]
[*][size=2]Go to the installation path of your Skyrim folder. ( For easy navigation, right click on your game shortcut, then select open file location ).[/size]
[*][size=2]Go to Data\SKSE\Plugins\Chargen\Presets, place it there AAAAAAAnd you're done.[/size]

[/list][size=4]Usage[/size]
[list=1]
[*][size=2]In game, open the console by tapping  the [/size][size=5]" ` "[/size][size=2] button, then type "showracemenu" ( Alternatively, you may use the mod ShowRaceMenu Alternative by Sir : Seb263 ).[/size]
[*][size=2]Racemenu showing up? good, now go to the presets tab of [color=#ffff00]RaceMenu[/color], then select any two of the presets and you're done.[/size]

[/list]
[size=6]Requirements
[/size]
[list=1]
[*][size=2]First of all you'll need the mod RaceMenu by Sir : expired6978.[/size]
[*][size=2]Then Bodyslide Outfit and Studio by Sir : Caliente ( you need it for the RaceMenu Morph ).[/size]
[*][size=2]Also you'll need THEHAG's Privat ( Private? ) Tattoos by Sir : THEHAG, for the tattoo to show up.[/size]
[*][size=2]I also used FSC by Sir : HHaleyy,  for the eyebrows ( yes, the texture I used is different, I'll cover it in the credits ).[/size]
[*][size=2]New Mikan Eyes by Sir : nerune, for the human version ( for the eyes, of course ).[/size]
[*][size=2]BVFE by Sir : Aipex8, for the vampire version ( this is not required, but a recommendation, for better looks of vampire, also optional ).[/size]
[*][size=2]Vampire Face Less Sunken Cheeks by Sir : Devacore ( so that her face isn't sunken or something, also optional if you want to become a vampire ).[/size]
[*][size=2]Also, Please use xp32 Maximum Skeleton Extended or Simply XPMSE by Sir : Groovtama ( for better Skeleton... right? ).[/size]
[*][size=2]HDT physics extension by Sir : HydrogensaysHDT, for the hair and other stuffs that used HDT physics.[/size]
[*][size=2]Original Vampire Races by Sir : Loshirai14, to be a vampire at the start...( Optional ).[/size]
[/list]
[size=6]Credits!
[/size][size=2]
First off... I must say Thank you very much! Sir expired6978 for making the mod [color=#ffff00]RaceMenu[/color].
[/size]Now for all the mods I used in these screenshots...
[list=1]
[*][size=2]KS Hairdos - HDT Physics by Sir : Stealthic Khaos[/size]
[*][size=2]Remodeled Armor for UUNP BodySlide HDT by Sir : gamefever[/size]
[*][size=2]Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade by Sir : krytopyr ( for the circlet... which is almost invicible ).[/size]
[*][size=2]Female Facial Animation by Sir : nao4288, for enhanced female expression she had in the screen shots.[/size]
[*][size=2]Pretty Sit Idles by Sir : dualsun, for the sitting animation[/size]
[*][size=2]Faction Crossbows by Sir : nsk13 for the Bad-Ass Crossbow I'm using ( which is bearly noticable in the screenshots ).[/size]
[*][size=2]Seductive Lips HD by Sir : EcthelionOtW,for the lips.[/size]
[*][size=2]Imaginator - Visual Control Device for Skyrim by Sir : MGE, for you people to see some dark figures... ( which is also bearly noticable... like the cross bow and the circlet ).[/size]
[*][size=2]Bikini Trouble UUNP Bodyslide by Sir : Xaratho Hawke - For The Brassiere she used.[/size]
[*][size=2]PC Head Tracking and Voice Type by Sir : HHaleyy, for The head tracker I used in some of the screenshots.[/size]
[*][size=2]Pinup Poser by Sir : Halo ( not in here in the nexus ), for some poses I used.[/size]
[*][size=2]Kinoko pose by Sir : cryptoporus also for some poses I used in the screen shot.[/size]
[*][size=2]DynaVision - Dynamic Depth of Field by Sir : Gopher, for the DOF mod.[/size]
[*][size=2]Authentic Whiterun by Sir : Laast, These Screen shots were made in Whiterun But I also used a mod for Whiterun, so I guess I'll add it too[/size]
[*][size=2]Some mods are not mentioned because they've been covered already at the requirements... If I missed one, I must say I'm sorry...[/size]
[*][size=2]Lastly I must say Thank you to everyone in Bethesda for making a very awesome game.[/size]
[/list][/left]
author: SirAdam
